name: Die Hunter
description:
Play as an artifact hunter in search of the Die of Fate. Get it back to your ship but beware the Guardians and the roll of the die!

Game made for the GMTK 2022 game jam.

Theme: Roll of the Dice

How to play:

  • WASD to move, Left Mouse to shoot
  • Shoot the Die of Fate to move it, but watch how the Die lands!
  • Escape with the Die before the Guardians stop you.
